column1: Note: Obs J Henry Belville using Crosley's gauge in 1810s, assumed to continue in 1820s. From 1840s on, sheets described as Crosley's gauge.
Note that during the 1820s and 1830s, Henry Belville moved the gauge on numerous occasions.
These were small moves, none too far from the Observatory in the roads surrounding Greenwich Park. See further sheets for data
